welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bensenville, a charming town known for its historic architecture and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and more.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and more.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Volaris and Porter.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Municipal Airport, serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
